data.title: Regent University
data.meta_description: Find unparalleled opportunities for learning at Regent University. Regent is a Private school in Virginia Beach, Virginia.
data.text: Regent University is a private college in Virginia Beach, Virginia and has been named to the Abound: Finish College Best Online Colleges: South and Best Colleges for Military and Veterans award lists for 2024. The schoolâ€™s online program features 6 online degree options and 3,418 online students. The on-campus average net price to attend is $17,341 and the per-credit hour charge for part-time students is $603. The school offers online degrees, credit for life experiences, weekend/evening classes, academic counseling services, career services, credit for military training, and more.
